title: Group Website
description: A website dedicated to your group and not the software hosting it. Use a subdomain or configure your own web domain for ultimate portability.

title: Data Portability
description: Don't be held hostage to your group's hosting platform. Own your data, build on top or our platform or export it all and migrate to something new when the time is right.

title: Privacy Controls
description: Make a members-only private group or a public group where basic info is published but member privacy is still protected.

title: Event Calendar
description: Create events and accept RSVPs. Share rich descriptions and limit access to online meeting URLs to attendees.

title: Member Profiles
description: Allow members to share their backgrounds and interests. Member profiles are always limited to other signed-in members.

title: Leadership Team
description: Share group responsibilities with other members by appointing others to help administer the group.

title: Custom Membership Applications
description: Add members by hand or allow people to submit a membership application that can be accepted or declined.

title: API Access
description: Use the GraphQL API endpoint for full data access. Build on top of our platform or backup your data.
